Invocation Name: dialysis center
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fresenius Kidney Care is committed to helping people with chronic kidney disease (CKD) and end stage renal disease (ESRD) lead fuller, more active and vibrant lives. Serving over 190,000 patients in over 2,400 facilities nationwide, our care teams are dedicated to helping people thrive on dialysis and live longer, healthier lives.
The Dialysis Finder voice guide helps people find Fresenius Kidney Care Dialysis Centers and provides details about the locations via SMS. 
Get information on Fresenius Kidney Care Dialysis Centers by saying, “Alexa, open Dialysis Center” and then provide details of the desired location along with your cell phone number.

Disclaimer: This content is intended for use by United States residents only. This content is for informational purposes only and is not intended to replace a discussion with a health care provider.
